title: My MMR is lower then usual??
body: Hey guys. I checked my mmr on op.gg it said i had lower then usual by a substantial amount. This makes no sense i have more wins than loses and play with people about my rank some higher then me rank. Can someone tell me why my mmr is so low.

replies.body: There is no way of knowing ur reall mmr

When you get promoted your MMR will usually be lower than the average in the promoted division (if you had 'average' MMR before)

Just keep winning games, I wouldn't worry too much about it being low atm, it will go up.
Because MMR calculation sites don't work.
